duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop a high-energy, driven stock team and inspire associates to achieve superior operational excellence and inventory accuracy.
Lead the team to ensure smooth transitions of product from delivery trucks to storage and sales floor.
Process shipments safely and efficiently, ensuring all merchandise is properly tagged for inventory accuracy.
Authenticate the destruction of products that have been marked out of stock (MOS) and audit release of product to third-party delivery partners and customers.
Educate stock team on safety guidelines, inventory policies, and procedures to deliver an extraordinary experience to customers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Retail Management, or related field
